question: Who has taken charge as new Prime Minister of Sudan?
explanation: Prominent economist Abdalla Hamdok has taken charge as the new Prime Minister of Sudan and vowed to work towards ending the country\'s economic crisis and establishing peace. In his new role, Hamdok will be tasked to deal with Sudan\'s mounting economic problems viz. high inflation and unemployment after decades of poor governance. His biggest challenge would be integrating his country into the international economy after 20 years of crippling United States trade sanctions.
